revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Fon Wireless |model=FON2501 |revision=B |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/29/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG8013H22 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UVAFON2501 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5358UB0;BCM5358UB0KFBG, HG1250 P20, 255414 N1A W; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6AB160TSD-5G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5358UB0;BCM5357UB0KFBG, HG1250 P20, 255414 N1A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43236B;BCM43236BKMLG, HT1249 P21, 252948 6 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.10.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} A triangular '''RoHS''' logo and "P/N: 141801320000J R01" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The antenna models are referred to as '''Arcadyan''' ''WG8013H22-FO''s in the FCC test report. :The presumed '''Arcadyan''' internal model is presumed to be WG8013H22. :The (or a) default SSID may be '''MyPlace'''.
